txt.en: I have need of you, my adventuring friend, in Caras Galadhon. Come to me outside the House of Celeborn my husband, and we will speak of the things I have seen in my Mirror, and the friend whose health you placed in my care. There will be a need of you in Rohan, and I have words you may wish to hear before you depart for that land.\n\n(This will begin Volume III Book 7 of the Epic Story. Completion of Book 6 is strongly encouraged, but not required. If you progress Book 7 of the Epic Story, you will eventually obtain a war-steed for riding in the Plains of Rohan.)
